description:
This course is designed for everyone with a desire to create a happier and greater life. And the willing and commitment to make it happen.

Through a step by step process that is designed to bring out your heart's desires, you will envision a life that feels so good and true to you and create your life vision and board. This will give your thoughts and actions the direction to move, all in direct alignment with your life purpose.

By the end of this course you will have a clear and compelling life vision which will guide you forward in life. And you will also:

  • recognize your life purpose
  • self-reflect
  • be more self-aware and connected to your heart's desires
  • have more clarity in your life
  • create a vision board that empowers your vision
  • feel motivated and inspired to create your dream life
  • feel ready to take your life to the next level
  • feel a drive to make great things happen
  • feel on purpose
  • feel the pull to be your best self

Feel free to look at the curriculum, watch the previews and I look forward seeing you inside,

Bahar
title: Create Your Life Vision
